W17_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After passing through the door, you find yourself in a very unsettling world. Will you find a triangle here?

W17_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: The wave is directing you toward this place.
